paragraphs.text: The push for a global audience could be a catastrophe for British sitcoms.
paragraphs.label: title

paragraphs.text: Pulling, Sharon Horgan's sitcom about three venal women in Penge, south London, was so good it got you evangelical
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: I bought the boxset for friends and had to explain it was because it was brilliant, not because it reminded me of them
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: It was funny and unfiltered and bleak enough to take your breath away
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: So
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: while I'm cheered that she's got a new show on television
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: the rave reviews for the first episode make me feel like a teetotaller at a lock-in
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: I just don't get it
paragraphs.label: other

paragraphs.text: Pulling was a classic British sitcom
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: in that it was riven with self-loathing, and its situation - the gap between its characters' desire to pull and their capacity to do so - inherently fraught and fruitful
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: In Catastrophe, Horgan plays a woman who gets pregnant after a brief fling with a visiting American
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: played by the standup Rob Delaney
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: Already, this feels Working Title-ready: a sit- that more readily begets rom than com
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Then there's the detail
paragraphs.label: other

paragraphs.text: In, say
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: the similarly plotted Knocked Up there was some tension over whether a groomed high-flier and an unemployed stoner would be able to make it to the delivery room
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: In Catastrophe they seem ideally suited from the get-go
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: He's a successful businessman who wants to move to the UK, marry her and sit through awful suppers with her friends
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: They are a happy couple expecting a baby
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: They have hot sex and give each other justifiable compliments
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: This is not how I want my British sitcoms to be
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: I don't want them to be like Friends - soaps in disguise, scripted by a crack squad of gag writers
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: I don't want them to be Americanised; to be glossy and hopeful
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: I switched over to Catastrophe after my first encounter with Broadchurch
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: whose bath/bathwater/kitchen sink plotting - and its makeover job on Dorset - suggest similarly transatlantic influences and ambitions
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: But it did at least feature Olivia Colman weeping her way through some horrible intercourse: a dash of Peep Show in an hour of wacky trash
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The export market is important
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Telly and films are some of the things we do best
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: But it'd be a shame
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: if
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: our eagerness to sell overseas was a slippery slope
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Palatable doesn't mean losing flavour
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: I love the smell of kebab in the morning
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: it smells like home
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: I live in a largely Turkish part of north London famed for its grand parade of grill restaurants
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: The carcinogenic whiff wanders all the way up the side street to our house
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: smoke fuelled by the appetites of those
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: who come from all round town to guzzle the meat feasts (top tip: Gokyuzu's jumbo platter - stuffs six for? 44)
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: But over the past few years the area has had an influx of non-Turkish types - vegetarians, vegans even
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: who, while they can have a (delicious) charred aubergine in the restaurants, aren't massively catered for by the shops
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The 24-hour grocer has a massive halal display as its front counter
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: two doors down is a great Greek butcher with a hopeful window sticker: "Pork. Go on, give it a try! It's tasty!"
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: Last Monday, everything changed
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: A new independent store appeared to plug the gap precisely
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: There is quinoa
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: There are multiple types of Italian pasta. A range of challenging beans. Staggeringly expensive organic baby food. And an array of tofu products and mushroom-protein burger mixes
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: For a long while now, I've felt there is no better place to live than Harringay, a model of cross-cultural tolerance and integration
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Now
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: even vegans are welcome
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The big movie debate at the moment is over American Sniper, Clint Eastwood's gung-ho Iraq drama
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Does its whopping box office (and six shock Oscar nods) indicate a creeping Islamophobia?
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Or
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: simply
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: how
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: out of touch liberal Hollywood is with mainstream American taste?
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: People have protested that the Iraqi soldiers are treated like chess pieces, mere ciphers, cannon fodder
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: This is true
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: But it is not limited to the film's baddies
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Clint has also attracted criticism for cutting corners and using fake babies rather than troublesome real ones, resulting in some conspicuously plastic offspring for Bradley Cooper and Sienna Miller
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: This is just what film directors do
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: For them, everybody is basically a superannuated dolly
paragraphs.label: assumption
